item.title: Shahid bought this car for 4.5 million taka
item.dc:creator: admins
item.description: Shahid Kapoor is one of the hot stars of Bollywood. But his car hobby is a bit more. This Bollywood actor’s garage is adorned with numerous prestigious cars. This time Mercedes Maybach GLS 600 has been added to this list. He recently bought this car and now he is in discussion.Anyone’s eyes will be dazzled […]
item.content:encoded:
Shahid Kapoor is one of the hot stars of Bollywood. But his car hobby is a bit more. This Bollywood actor’s garage is adorned with numerous prestigious cars. This time Mercedes Maybach GLS 600 has been added to this list. He recently bought this car and now he is in discussion.
Anyone’s eyes will be dazzled by Shahid’s car collection. Now another expensive car has been added to his garage. This Bollywood star bought the Mercedes Mayback GLS 600 car and is now practicing.

Maybach India shared an image on their official page. Shahid and his wife Mira Rajput are seen standing in front of their new car with ‘goodies’ in their hands. The picture of this star couple has spread in the net world. Net Janata congratulates Shahid and Meera for buying a new car.

The price of the elite Mercedes Maybach GLS 600 car is said to be four and a half crores in Bangladeshi currency. Last year, Shahid bought a Mercedes Maybach S580. The price of this car was around 2.8 crores. Apart from this, Shahid’s car collection includes famous cars like Range Rover Vogue, Porsche Scion GTS, Jaguar XKR-S, Mercedes-AMG S400. Each of its cars cost more than crores of rupees.

Mercedes Maybach GLS 600 car has been bought by Ranveer Singh, Arjun Kapoor, Kriti Shannon, Neetu Singh. This time the owner of this expensive car is Shahid. This Bollywood star made his debut in OTT this year. He was seen in OTT projects ‘Forgy’ and ‘Bloody Daddy’. He is all set to hit the big screen next year with Kriti Shannon.

item.title: After 12 years of love, two producers got married
item.dc:creator: admins
item.description: ‘Barbie’ creator Greta Gerwig is married to longtime partner, producer Noah Baumbach. They have been together for almost a century; This couple has given form to the relationship of love.The American magazine People reported that they got married in a domestic ceremony at the New York City Hall. The story of the popular movie ‘Barbie’ […]
item.content:encoded:
‘Barbie’ creator Greta Gerwig is married to longtime partner, producer Noah Baumbach. They have been together for almost a century; This couple has given form to the relationship of love.
The American magazine People reported that they got married in a domestic ceremony at the New York City Hall. The story of the popular movie ‘Barbie’ was jointly written by Noah Baumbach and Greta Gerwig.

They met while working in the movie ‘Greenbird’ in 2010; 40-year-old Greta and 54-year-old Noah have been in a relationship since 2011. Their first child Harold Ralph was born in 2019. In an interview given to Elle UK last July, Greta Gerwig said that their second child was born in February this year.
The pair received an Oscar nomination in 2020; Noah with ‘Marriage Story’ and Greta with ‘Little Women’ walked the Oscars red carpet.
